name: Pets in Need - Low-Cost Vet Services
description: Low-cost vet care, spay/neuter, vaccinations, microchipping, and more
fullDescription: Pets in Need operates a community veterinary clinic in Redwood City providing affordable care to help families keep their pets healthy.
whatTheyOffer:
- Low-cost wellness exams
- Spay and neuter surgeries
- Vaccinations and preventive care
- Microchipping
- Basic medical treatments
- Additional discounts for income-qualified
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the Pets in Need website or call for appointment
2. Schedule your pet's appointment
3. Bring proof of income for discounted rates (if applicable)
4. Pay reduced fees at time of service
keywords: Pets in Need, low-cost vet, Redwood City, spay, neuter, vaccinations, microchip, wellness exam, San Mateo, affordable vet
